title.rendered: “IDF Thwarts Terrorist Attack near Parsa Junction: A Blow-by-Blow Account”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

This morning a terrorist fired at an Israeli vehicle near the Parsa junction in the Ephraim Brigade area, IDF soldiers, accompanied by an Israeli Air Force aircraft, initiated a pursuit and exchanged fire with the terrorist.

During the pursuit, a combat helicopter attacked the terrorist and eliminated him in a complex area near the junction.

Attached is footage of the elimination of the terrorist: https://bit.ly/3x83da7

Attached is footage from the situation assessment held by the Central Command commander with additional commanders at the scene of the attack: https://bit.ly/3PwSQ60

Attached are pictures on the subject: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC220220245410
